name: Cloud Slayer
description:
Cloud Slayer

Controls:

W-A-S-D to move around

Left mouse click to fire rockets

Right mouse click to fire mega rocket

Shop:

Earned coins can be used for upgrades which allow you to survive longer in game. You can also fill up the fuel tank or buy a mega rocket which if used correctly can clear the whole screen from annoying clouds.

Figure out how to upgrade efficiently and also save the ammo, since you will not be getting to much of it in the later stages of the game. Good luck!
